cause.description:
Mistreatment of individuals we determine are different than us is a vast problem in our society and the world as a whole.
1. Everyone one around you, regardless of how different they are from you, deserves respect.
2. The only time an individual deserves less respect is when they wrong you or another individual.
cause.mission: Open humans minds to the different characteristics, beliefs, and lifestyles of others.
cause.name: A Universe of the Unique
